title: Spittin' Chiclets Episode 327: Featuring Shayne Corson
description:
On Episode 327 of Spittinâ€™ Chiclets, the guys are joined by NHL legend Shayne Corson. Shayne joined (59:37) to discuss his incredible career that included playing with Gretzky, the Olympics, Canada Cup, and playing with Brett Hull. He also discussed his mental health, women's hockey, fighting families in his hometown and tons more. The guys open the show talking about the recent sandbagger, Crosby vs Ovi and who is the king of the jungle. The boys wrap up talking The Masters, The Sonk, and some potential trades.


You can find every episode of this show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify or YouTube. Prime Members can listen ad-free on Amazon Music. For more, visit barstool.link/schiclets
